content.query:
use nyc_taxi_ldw;


create or alter PROCEDURE silver.usp_calendar
AS
begin
if object_id('silver.calendar') is not null drop  EXTERNAL table silver.calendar;

create external table silver.calendar
with (
    data_source=nyc_taxi_src,
    location='silver/calendar',
    file_format=parquet_file_format
)
AS
select * from bronze.calendar;

 end
